tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geolocation_data (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  location_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE places (
  place_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    place_id INT REFERENCES places(place_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE places (
    place_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    place_name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(200),
    location GEOMETRY,
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location GEOMETRY,
    end_location GEOMETRY,
    distance DECIMAL,
    duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    location GEOMETRY,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    place_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    rating INTEGER,
    review_text TEXT
);
